Protocols/ButtonProductCompatible.html#/.name: upc
Protocols/ButtonProductCompatible.html#/.abstract: The UPC (Universal Product Code) of the product.

Protocols/ButtonProductCompatible.html#/.name: categories
Protocols/ButtonProductCompatible.html#/.abstract: A flat array of the names of the categories to which the product belongs.

Protocols/ButtonProductCompatible.html#/.name: currency
Protocols/ButtonProductCompatible.html#/.abstract: The ISO-4217 currency code in which the product’s value is reported.

Protocols/ButtonProductCompatible.html#/.name: value
Protocols/ButtonProductCompatible.html#/.abstract: The value of the order. Includes any discounts, if applicable. Example: 1234 for $12.34.

Protocols/ButtonProductCompatible.html#/.name: attributes
Protocols/ButtonProductCompatible.html#/.abstract: Any additional attributes to be included with the product.

Protocols/Activity.html#/c:@M@ButtonMerc.name: productViewed(_:)
Protocols/Activity.html#/c:@M@ButtonMerc.abstract: Report that the user has viewed a product.

Protocols/Activity.html#/c:@M@ButtonMerc.name: productAddedToCart(_:)
Protocols/Activity.html#/c:@M@ButtonMerc.abstract: Report that the user added a product to their cart.

Protocols/Activity.html#/c:@M@ButtonMerc.name: cartViewed(_:)
Protocols/Activity.html#/c:@M@ButtonMerc.abstract: Report that the user viewed their cart.

Protocols/Activity.html.name: Activity
Protocols/Activity.html.abstract: A protocol through which user activities can be reported.

Protocols/ButtonProductCompatible.html.name: ButtonProductCompatible
Protocols/ButtonProductCompatible.html.abstract: A protocol that defines the product properties that may be provided when reporting user activity.

Classes/Order/LineItem.html#/s:14ButtonM.name: quantity
Classes/Order/LineItem.html#/s:14ButtonM.abstract: The number of unique units represented by this line item (default is 1).

Classes/Order/LineItem.html#/s:14ButtonM.name: sku
Classes/Order/LineItem.html#/s:14ButtonM.abstract: The Stock Keeping Unit of the line item.

Classes/Order/LineItem.html#/s:14ButtonM.name: upc
Classes/Order/LineItem.html#/s:14ButtonM.abstract: The Universal Product Code of the line item.

Classes/Order/LineItem.html#/s:14ButtonM.name: attributes
Classes/Order/LineItem.html#/s:14ButtonM.abstract: A key/value store for strings to specify additional information about a line item.

Classes/Order/LineItem.html#/s:14ButtonM.name: init(id:total:)
Classes/Order/LineItem.html#/s:14ButtonM.abstract: An array of the line item details that comprise the order

Classes/Order/Customer.html#/s:14ButtonM.name: isNew
Classes/Order/Customer.html#/s:14ButtonM.abstract: A flag indicating whether the customer is new (or not).

Classes/Order/Customer.html#/s:14ButtonM.name: init(id:)
Classes/Order/Customer.html#/s:14ButtonM.abstract: Initializes a customer object with the passed parameters.

Classes/Order.html#/c:@M@ButtonMerchant@.name: init(id:purchaseDate:lineItems:)
Classes/Order.html#/c:@M@ButtonMerchant@.abstract: Initializes an order object with the passed parameters.

Classes/Order/LineItem.html.name: LineItem
Classes/Order/LineItem.html.abstract: Represents a line item in the order.

Classes/ButtonMerchant.html#/c:@M@Button.name: attributionToken
Classes/ButtonMerchant.html#/c:@M@Button.abstract: The last attributionToken from an inbound Button attributed URL.

Classes/ButtonMerchant.html#/c:@M@Button.name: trackIncomingURL(_:)
Classes/ButtonMerchant.html#/c:@M@Button.abstract: Checks the passed URL for a Button attribution and if present stores the token.

Classes/ButtonMerchant.html#/c:@M@Button.name: trackIncomingUserActivity(_:)
Classes/ButtonMerchant.html#/c:@M@Button.abstract: Checks the URL in the passed NSUserActivity for Button attribution and if present stores the token.

Classes/ButtonMerchant.html#/c:@M@Button.name: handlePostInstallURL(_:)
Classes/ButtonMerchant.html#/c:@M@Button.abstract: Checks to see if the user visited a url destined for your app prior to installing your app.

Classes/ButtonMerchant.html#/c:@M@Button.name: clearAllData()
Classes/ButtonMerchant.html#/c:@M@Button.abstract: Discards the current session and all persisted data.

Classes/ButtonMerchant.html#/c:@M@Button.name: features
Classes/ButtonMerchant.html#/c:@M@Button.abstract: An interface through which library features can be enabled/disabled.

Classes/ButtonMerchant.html#/c:@M@Button.name: activity
Classes/ButtonMerchant.html#/c:@M@Button.abstract: An interface through which user activity can be reported.

Classes/ButtonProduct.html.name: ButtonProduct
Classes/ButtonProduct.html.abstract: A concrete implementation of the ButtonProductCompatible protocol.

Classes/Order.html.name: Order
Classes/Order.html.abstract: Represents an order placed by the user to be reported using ButtonMerchant.reportOrder(order).
